scripts.build:backend: esbuild server.ts http-types.ts express-adapter.ts vercel-adapter.ts cloudflare-adapter.ts aws-lambda-adapter.ts lambda.ts serverless.ts api/handler.ts workers/index.ts functions/*.ts services/*.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outdir=dist-server
scripts.build:lambda: rm -rf dist-lambda && mkdir -p dist-lambda && npm run build:lambda:source && echo '{"type": "commonjs"}' > dist-lambda/package.json && cd dist-lambda && zip function.zip lambda.js package.json
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
